title: New PathWiper Data Wiper Malware Disrupts Ukrainian Critical Infrastructure in 2025 Attack
summary:

title: Proxy Services Feast on Ukraine’s IP Address Exodus
summary: Ukraine has seen nearly one-fifth of its Internet space come under Russian control or sold to Internet address brokers since February 2022, a new study finds.
